page.title: 09Local Museum - a local issue
page.content: The Unst Local History Group is a flourishing group which has been formed for 4 years and has held three successful exhibitions on local history.So successful were these exhibitions that there was a general feeling in favour of a small local museum.Sites were discussed and meet- ings were held and finally a choice was made between 2 sites.At this point the local councillor felt the choice made was unfair and took a firm stand against it.Further meetings were held with the Shetland Amenity Trust who are behind the funding of such projects and even a local referendum was held which came out against the first choice.Finally a stop gap of an old shop was taken up while tempers cool and hopefully a decision about a permanent site will be made in the near future.
